## BoundingBoxTree class

Bounding box tree

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class BoundingBoxTree extends AABBTree implements BoundingVolume 
```
**Extends:** [AABBTree](doc/markdown/./scene.aabbtree.md)

**Implements:** [BoundingVolume](doc/markdown/./scene.boundingvolume.md)
